user_stories.title: Development Environment Setup
user_stories.description: As a Developer, I want a fully configured development environment so that I can start building features immediately
acceptance_criteria: Docker Desktop running with all containers
VS Code with Claude Code extension
tasks: Install VS Code + extensions (Python, ESLint, Prettier, Claude Code)

user_stories.title: Cloud Infrastructure Provisioning
user_stories.description: As a DevOps Engineer, I want production-ready cloud infrastructure so that all services can be deployed and scaled
tasks: Create GCP project or AWS account
Set up VPC with public/private subnets
Set up secrets management (GCP Secret Manager or AWS Secrets Manager)

user_stories.title: Neo4j Knowledge Graph Setup
user_stories.description: As a Data Engineer, I want a Neo4j instance with medical ontologies loaded so that the RAG system can perform knowledge graph queries
tasks: Deploy Neo4j (Neo4j Aura or self-hosted on GCP/AWS)
Download 13 ontologies (SNOMED-CT, ICD-10/11, RxNorm, LOINC, CPT, HL7 FHIR, UMLS, HPO, GO, DO, DrugBank, CQL, OMOP CDM)
Create Python scripts for ontology parsing
Test query performance (<100ms for simple queries)
